ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Douglas A. Halfyard ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. DOUGLAS A. HALFYARD, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective on July 14, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
